reviews.headline: Noup!
reviews.comments: I tried it because I've used the serum frkm the same brand; it does not mix well with the rest of my skin care routine and it balls up, so it is better if is used by itself. I am not refraining myself from using my usual skin care  products, so I stopped using this one. I keep using the serum though.

reviews.headline: Not as expected
reviews.comments: I am very disappointed in these eucerin products. It made my face very dry and it burns when I apply the products. I use the regular eucerin cream and it helps. So I was surprised that these products did the opposite.

reviews.headline: Eucerin SPF 30
reviews.comments: This lotion is good for indoors or not so hot days outside. This product works with the whole collection and prevents me from getting more Dark spots.

reviews.headline: Smells Like Formula 409
reviews.comments: It rubs in really well, leaves no white cast, and doesn't feel greasy (although it LOOKS a little greasy). HOWEVER. It smells EXACTLY like Formula 409 lemon scented multi-surface cleaner, and the second time I used it, it burned my face and stung my eyes.

reviews.headline: Allergic Reaction
reviews.comments: I purchased the daily lotion and dark spot serum. I believe i am allergic to one of the ingredients in these products. After use my face immediately broke out in a rash/hives.  I wish i could return and get my money back.

reviews.headline: Just a NO, the fragrance
reviews.comments: Eucerin, please remove the fragrance from this line.  Do not recommend as this product.

faceoff_positive.comments:
Eucerin is a great brand that I have used with success for improving the texture and moisture of my dry skin. I am excited to use a formula for dark spots!
Scent: The sunscreen has a very sunscreen-y smell. It is overpowering for awhile, but becomes more manageable with wear.
Look: It starts off with a very white cast. After carefully rubbing it in a minute or two it looks as though I have nothing on.
Feel: It has a very creamy feel. It's not heavy like some sunscreens. Eurcerin lotion makes my skin so soft and helps with the dryness, which is why I wanted to try this.. My skin is just as soft as when I use their other lotions, but with the added bonus of protection from the sun.
Overall 9/10
This review was for: Eucerin Radiant Tone Daily Face Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen, Dark Spot Corrector with Thiamidol, Helps Visibly Reduce the Look of Persistent Dark Spots, 1.7 Fl Oz Bottle and was provided by PinchMe free of cost for me to sample & review. #pinchme #eucerin #darkspots
faceoff_positive.headline: Eucerin never disappoints!

faceoff_negative.comments: I appreciate being selected to try this product but I was not a fan of it. It was too thick/heavy for my skin, ( I have acne, oily skin so I'm very careful if a product is too heavy for my skin because it will within a couple days break me out ) I tried to use this product for a month to be able to give a thorough review but I started getting breakouts so I thought maybe 2 weeks? But the breakouts started becoming more & more & also it's heavily fragrance in my opinion & I don't like fragrance in my skincare ( I can do earthy, herbal, oats, etc but I prefer fragrance free, this one smells like straight florals ), the good thing is the scent did faint within a couple hours, I wanted to see if it helps with my dark spot since it says it's geared towards that but because of the breakouts & the scent I couldn't continue using it & ended up gifting to my mom who don't have a sensitive skin like mine & also I didn't feel it was moisturizing.
faceoff_negative.headline: Thick & fragrance
